# hasActions

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the node is currently executing any actions.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasActions: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the node has any executing actions; otherwise the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Inspecting a Node’s Running Actions

- **action(forKey:)**: Returns an action associated with a specific key.
- **actionKeys**: The list of keys for which the node has attached actions.
